programme.title: iFipempula: Season 1, Episode 25
programme.desc: 'S1/E25'. Women with conflicting views on love and marriage fall on hard times and are brought together by 'chilimba' which they had joined to ensure their financial survival.

programme.title: Shi Mumbi: Season 4, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S4/E2'. Shimumbi tries to regain control of the house by giving bana Mumbi some rules and also tries to put Belinda in her place for having too much freedom in the house.

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S2/E2'. The chiefs retainer(kapaso) gets drunk and abandons his post of duty. Mwinemushi has had enough and fires him.

programme.desc: 'S1/E10'. Our Perfect Wedding is a reality television series that gets up close and personal with twelve very unique couples across Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Date My Family Zambia: Season 1, Episode 12
programme.desc: 'S1/E12'. Date My Family helps Zambian singletons find love by sending them on dates with their potential partner's family.

programme.title: City On Fire: Season 1, Episode 39
programme.desc: 'S1/E39'. City on fire is a drama series which explores the complex happing of a city were virtue and evil are in perpetual battle for supremacy

programme.title: Kuyamika Voices Of Praise: Season 1, Episode 21
programme.desc: 'S1/E21 of 26 - 1/21'. It's time to raise our voices and praise Him. Let us shout joyfully to Him in song. Join us for an uplifting selection of gospels songs from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Afro Pops: Season 1, Episode 33
programme.desc: 'S1/E33'. Afro-Pops showcases the best rhythms and drum beats from Africa. Enjoy the latest and greatest hits across the continent.

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 7
programme.desc: 'S2/E7'. Polopela is forced to make a stand and choose between two women, his wife or the 'other woman'. Pressed to tell how the other woman came into his life?

programme.title: Reflections: Season 1, Episode 2
programme.desc: 'S1/E2 - Not Everyone Is Who They Seem'. Thuli and Sbu's connection grows and their stunt of painting the salon without Zanele's knowledge draws some business. Lindy plays being a PI to find information on Sbu.

programme.title: Luthando: Rating: 13, Drama, 2014
programme.desc: Cinderella, with a Mzansi twist. A young girl is being ill-treated by her stepmother and stepsister. She hopes to find freedom at the pending Zulu reed-dance ceremony.

programme.title: Indandatho Yokukhanya: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A supernatural drama about a timid and overly cautious girl who finds out that her parents' spirits were taken by a dark force. It becomes her mission to save them.

programme.title: Selomotho: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A brother turns his brother into a beastly creature so he can get to rule over his father's kingdom. Only pure love can remove the hideous spell over him.

programme.title: Unongendi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A selfless young woman has to plan her sister's wedding. However, she is in love with her sister's fiancÃ©.

programme.title: Ngithanda Wena: Rating: 13, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: Jabu Motsamayi, a drug addict who decides to clean up his life, and Sizwe Ngwenya, a decent man who gives Jabu a second chance when no one else will.

programme.title: Imoto Yokufa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young man's desperation to own a fancy car leads him down a dangerous path when he purchases his boss's wife's stolen car.

programme.title: Ibala: Rating: 13, Drama, 2017
programme.desc: A young girl with albinism meets her fiance's family for the first time. However, they forbid him from marrying her and threaten to disown him if he does.

programme.title: Ingane Ka Baba: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: A teenage boy tries to prove that his alcoholic father was wrongfully accused of a murder, while also trying to save his parents' marriage.

programme.title: Salamina: Rating: 16, Drama, 2019
programme.desc: A city raised cheeseboy goes back home to his father's village. He thinks their ways are backward and tries to survive using his city ways.

programme.title: Madi Aka: Rating: 13, Drama, 2015
programme.desc: Tumi, a 17-year-old orphan, lost her mother at an early age and has only seen a picture of her father. She starts forming an unexplainable connection with the local bus driver.

programme.title: Amanxeba Ami: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When they find themselves accidentally locked inside their family business for the night, a young man and his father finally have an overdue heart-to-heart.

programme.title: Kasi Loving: Rating: 13, Romance, 2022
programme.desc: To raise funds for his LLB, Lerumo works part-time as a gardener for the Mazibukos. He meets Enhle there, and the two begin a relationship, but soon Mr Mazibuko finds out.

programme.title: Ubhuti Wami Lona: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: Two best friends raised by single parents plot to make their parents fall in love so they can be brothers, but the problem is their parents hate each other's guts.

programme.title: Areyeng Jozi: Rating: 13, Drama, 2023
programme.desc: Three best friends from a village in Limpopo travel to Johannesburg for the first time. A fun, adventure-filled trip teaches them that not all that glitter is gold.

programme.title: Icherrie Yam: Rating: 13, Drama, 2022
programme.desc: When Lindiso finally gets together with the love of his life, he thinks his luck has finally turned. However, things change when her thug ex-boyfriend gets released from prison.

programme.title: Panda: Rating: 16, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: When the owners of a house go away on a honeymoon, their gardener pretends to own the house in order to lure women and boost his self-esteem.

programme.title: Uk'Phandela Uthando: Rating: 13, Drama, 2018
programme.desc: A homeless couple only has each other and find themselves having to choose between money or entering a competition that could change their lives forever.

programme.title: Gwababa: Rating: 13, Drama, 2021
programme.desc: Tokollo and Kagiso struggle to ask girls out. When Tokollo falls for a beautiful girl who moved down the street, he gets the wrong advice, leading to disaster.

programme.title: Lokshin Bioskop: Campus Chaos: Rating: PG13, Comedy, 2012
programme.desc: Nandi is a senior student with a calling to become sangoma. Her daily rituals start causing conflict with her housemate, who's also the SRC president.

programme.title: Who's The Father: Rating: 13, Drama, 2013
programme.desc: A sangoma looks forward to celebrating his favourite daughter's birthday, but then a shocking revelation about the paternity of his children turns his world upside down.

programme.desc: 'S1/E27'. Women with conflicting views on love and marriage fall on hard times and are brought together by 'chilimba' which they had joined to ensure their financial survival.

programme.title: Shi Mumbi: Season 4, Episode 4
programme.desc: 'S4/E4'. Bana Mumbi tries to get answers from Belinda since Shimumbi said he owes Belinda some money that is why she moved in with them.

programme.title: Mwinemushi: Season 2, Episode 4
programme.desc: 'S2/E4'. The chiefs retainer(kapaso) gets drunk and abandons his post of duty. Mwinemushi has had enough and fires him.

programme.desc: 'S1/E12'. Our Perfect Wedding is a reality television series that gets up close and personal with twelve very unique couples across Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Date My Family Zambia: Season 2, Episode 1
programme.desc: 'S2/E1'. Date My Family helps singletons find love by sending them on dates with their potential partner's family. Can you really trust your family to help you find love?

programme.title: City On Fire: Season 1, Episode 39
programme.desc: 'S1/E39'. City on fire is a drama series which explores the complex happing of a city were virtue and evil are in perpetual battle for supremacy

programme.desc: 'S1/E23 of 26 - 1/23'. It's time to raise our voices and praise Him. Let us shout joyfully to Him in song. Join us for an uplifting selection of gospels songs from your favourite artists.
